statements: SELECT * FROM enrollment;
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM enrollment WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, student_id FROM enrollment WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM enrollment WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT student_id, enrollment_date, course_id FROM enrollment ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM enrollment WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollment WHERE student_id = 2 ORDER BY course_id;
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM enrollment WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_id FROM enrollment WHERE student_id = 3 AND enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM enrollment WHERE enrollment_date = (SELECT MAX(enrollment_date) FROM enrollment);
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_code FROM courses WHERE course_credit_hours > 3;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date, course_name FROM students INNER JOIN courses ON students.student_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, course_code FROM courses WHERE course_credit_hours > 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students s JOIN courses c ON s.student_id = c.course_id;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS student_count FROM courses JOIN students ON courses.course_id = students.student_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING student_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM Students WHERE student_age > 20;
SELECT course_name, course_instructor FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN StudentCourses ON Students.student_id = StudentCourses.student_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN StudentCourses ON Students.student_id = StudentCourses.student_id WHERE course_name LIKE 'Math%';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM Students WHERE student_age > 20;
SELECT course_name, course_instructor FROM Courses WHERE course_credits >= 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students s INNER JOIN StudentCourses sc ON s.student_id = sc.student_id INNER JOIN Courses c ON sc.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students s, StudentCourses sc, Courses c WHERE s.student_id = sc.student_id AND sc.course_id = c.course_id AND student_age BETWEEN 20 AND 25;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT name, major FROM students WHERE major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT student_id, course_id, semester FROM enrollments WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses WHERE credits >= 3;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM registrations WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses WHERE credits >= 3 ORDER BY credits DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM registrations WHERE grade='A' AND student_id=1;
SELECT name, major FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.id = enrollments.student_id WHERE semester='Fall' AND year=2021;

SELECT students.name, courses.course_name, enrollments.semester FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id ORDER BY students.name ASC, enrollments.semester DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_major FROM Students;
SELECT course_name, course_department FROM Courses;
SELECT enrollment_id, enrollment_date FROM Enrollments WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT grade FROM Grades WHERE enrollment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_major FROM Students WHERE student_major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT course_name FROM Courses WHERE course_department = 'Mathematics';
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Grades ON Enrollments.enrollment_id = Grades.enrollment_id;
SELECT student_name, semester_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Semester ON Enrollments.enrollment_date = Semester.semester_year;
